title: Who wants to bet Darius didn't get all his bugs fixed.
body:
He was just let out of riot jail.

Lets see what they fixed. 

And more importantly.

What they didnt.

Edit:

Amazing.

They only fixed the stun it seems.

10/10 

Maybe we'll get bugfixes patch 5.13...

replies.body: Seems like my thread was of no use...

{{champion:150}} "Ha, now that his pull glitch is gone, I can finally escape properly."
*Flashes out*
***GETS PULLED BACK TO DARIUS***
{{champion:150}} "WHY RITO WHYYYYY"
That's not a bug but k.
Whatever it is needs to be fixed, its so irritating to get pulled and waste your escapes only for Darius to use his invisible Elfen Lied hands to pull you back to him.
they're not hands... they're lightning tentacles!
